name: Severability Note Task force on warning signs and devices for unexploded ordnance.  L 2002, c 218, 3. Cross References
text: Severability.  If any provision of this chapter or the application thereof to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the invalidity shall not affect other provisions or applications of this chapter that can be given effect without the invalid provision or application, and to this end the provisions of this chapter are severable. [L 1993, c 340, pt of §2]
